name: Intro
body: You enter a tavern and find an old man at the bar. He says to you: “Welcome, traveler! If you’re going to stay here in town, you need to get a job. But first we need to find out more about you so you can find the best job for you.” (Press enter to continue.)

name: Professional Summary
body: “What is so special about you anyway? Tell me about yourself.”

name: Reaction 1
body: “Sounds good enough. But we need to see what you’re actually good at.”  (Press enter to continue.)

name: Accomplishments
body: “What are some of your proudest accomplishments out in the wasteland? Have you defeated a legendary deathclaw, uncovered hidden caches of valuable loot, or successfully negotiated a peace treaty between rival factions?”

name: Finale
body: “Okay we can work with this. You’re ready to start work. It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.” (Press enter to continue.)
